attributes.action: Use all means to encourage Japan and other countries to cease the slaughter of Dolphins
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dolphins are being rounded up and slaughtered to satisfy the deranged culinary requirements of a few rich individuals, with the remains being put in cat food, and the odd 'fortunate' dolphin being sold into politicianry in 'amusement parks' around the world (in particular the Caribbean). The UK Government should use all means available to stop this barbaric trade, including if necessary trade sanctions and indeed a full trade embargo against the offending countries.
